data.actual_result: the image does not change until you close and reopen the app. tried on 2 different servers. 2 different images each.
data.expected_result: save image and the new image sets
data.short_description: image does not change when editing server image
data.steps_to_repro: - be owner or admin (have proper permissions) on a server. - go to server settings - select overview - tap on image to edit - select wanted image - save - image stays as it was.
